post.body: i'm gonna need a lot of redemption for the thoughts alone.
i'm sending my redemption away, because it's no use here where i lay
i am checking into the hotel Bella Muerte
"give me a reason to believe" -My Chemical Romance "Thanks For The Venom"
i actually kinda have no fucking idea how to use this. technology is too advanced for me.
I am a HUGE INSANE PSYCHOTIC fan of MCR. you guys really did save my life and i am eternally gratefull.
